Author: conterium
Title: [ANN] CONTERIUM - DIGITAL MARKETPLACE SOLUTION FOR ALL PEOPLE
Body: CONTERIUM DIGITAL MARKETPLACE SOLUTION FOR ALL PEOPLE   WEBSITE | FACEBOOK | TELEGRAM CHANNEL | TELEGRAM GROUP | WHITEPAPER | TWITTER | GITHUB | MEDIUM | REDDIT    WHY CONTERIUM  Buying what you need from anywhere in the world Our platform will host millions of unique, tailor made items created by small scale manufacturers that you will not be able to buy in any large scale online store  Any item can be bought for cryptocurrency or CNM tokens With minimal fees, while real world currencies still remain relevant and valid  Increased cashback when paying with CNM tokens As well as discounts for purchases made with the tokens  Convenient and simple search for the goods you need Conterium offers an extensive catalog of items sold in stores across the platform with finetuned filters and categories, making finding the things you want to buy a simple experience  Guaranteed quality Conterium isn’t just another catchy name: the last two letters, QA, stand for Quality Assurance, and we mean it. We assume the responsibility of ensuring high quality service, and guarantee that the seller will send the buyer the exact item as described and outlined in the product description  Protecting customer interests and Conterium arbitration We guarantee the high quality of items offered through Conterium. If an item is damaged during shipping, the buyer can request arbitration through Conterium and request a full or partial refund (using the current exchange rate for cryptocurrency paid orders) after a review. If the refunded order was paid with CNM tokens, you will be refunded the exact amount of tokens regardless of the current exchange rate  Safe and secure smart contract deals When a transaction has been made, the seller can be sure that the buyer will receive their item(s) when and only when the it arrives at the destination. At the very moment that the seller sends the package, the buyer receives a tracking code, which will allow them to track their order real-time. The smart contract ensures that the money goes to the seller’s account only after the item has reached its destination. Failing that, the buyer will be eligible for a refund within 7 days  Honest reviews The smart contract records the interaction between the buyer and the seller, ensuring all reviews come from people who actually bought the item   TOKEN BENEFIT FOR INVESTOR  High Level Privacy Protection The Advantage to Buyer First The Advantage to Holder Token Can Contribute to be a Representative Office in Another Country with 100% Profit Get the Distribution of Proceeds to Holders of the Tokens Every Year   ICO DETAILS  Cost 1 CNM Start Price $0.02 Total Supply 500.000.000 CNM Adjustable All Unsold Tokens Will Be Destroyed Purchase Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum (ETH) Softcap $5 000 000 USD Hardcap $30 000 000 USD Start Date June 4, 2018 End Date September 30, 2018 Privat Sale $0.02 ( 4 June - 30 June 2018 ) Phase 1 Sale $0.1 ( 1 July - 31 July 2018 ) Phase 2 Sale $0.2 ( 1 August - 31 August 2018 ) Phase 3 Sale $0.3 ( 1 Sept - 30 Sept 2018 )    WEBSITE | FACEBOOK | TELEGRAM CHANNEL | TELEGRAM GROUP | WHITEPAPER | TWITTER | GITHUB | MEDIUM | REDDIT  CONTERIUM BOUNTY CAMPAIGN AIRDROP & COMPETITION  We are excited to announce the launch of our CONTERIUM Bounty Campaign, AIRDROP and COMPETITION Program. For helping us to grow our community and promote our token sale, you will receive CNM tokens for FREE! Through this Program, aim to give something back to our community for your support! Participate in the CONTERIUM Program now.  The CONTERIUM Token Crowdsale runs between 4th June 2018 until 30th Sept 2018 and the Program will run throughout the crowdsale. For completing each activity, you will receive a certain CNM Tokens. The number of all CNM tokens given out will be calculated after the token sale and 25 M CNM tokens will be distributed to the approved participants according to the stakes accumulated against the total amount after end ICO Sale. You must fill out the Application Form (Google Form) for your submission. Please note that only those applications submitted via the Bounty Campaign, Airdrop, Competition Program Application Google Form will be reviewed. We ask your best efforts to make our token sale a success. Please see below for the details of how you can participate in the the Conterium Bounty Campaign, Airdrop, Competition Program:  1. TOP REFFERAL BUY COMPETITION 2. TOP CREATIVE VIDEO COMPETIITON 3. TOP TELEGRAM GROUP CAMPAIGN COMPETITION 4. FACEBOOK BOUNTY 5. TWITTER BOUNTY 6. ARTICLE BOUNTY 7. VIDEO BOUNTY 8. TRANSLATOR 9. AIRDROP  Rules of Rewards  Each member must comply with the rules listed in this section to be eligible for the bounty rewards campaign. A campaign member’s Bitcointalk account must have a positive trust rating. You agree not to remove, delete or otherwise undo any threads, posts, articles, forum signatures or any other content or changes listed in the participation requirements below until the end of the Token sale campaign in order to remain eligible for bounty rewards. All bounty rewards will be issued at the end of the Token sale campaign.   TOP REFFERAL BUY COMPETITION How to participate: All members who have registered and confirmed eligible to participate in this competition.  Reward 1. 1st 600 000 CNM 2. 2nd 300 000 CNM 3. 3rd 100 000 CNM   TOP TELEGRAM GROUP CAMPAIGN COMPETITION How to participate: 1. Replace a group photo with the logo Conterium for the bounty took place. 2. Pinned Post update information Conterium. 3. Submit the Telegram Grup Application Form: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSc48hGUxLkPLkxV8deJ70mrfg5XBPgCClHCejohCNAxeqJjSw/viewform?usp=sf_link  Reward 1. 1st 500 000 CNM 2. 2nd 300 000 CNM 3. 3rd 200 000 CNM 4-35 @50 000 CNM  Approved Participants: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1nwUgUf5THKC9lWkhWOusN-xjB-isCCvjkZi-BryAZt0/edit?usp=sharing   FACEBOOK BOUNTY CAMPAIGN How to participate: 1. Like Conterium Fans Page account: https://www.facebook.com/conterium/ 2. Shared the post Fans Page: https://www.facebook.com/conterium/ 3. Submit the Bounty Application Form: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSftvp5cMdKzwUQmNLasyYdRw13RZsIfirdstkUTZOKJdsL_0w/viewform?usp=sf_link  Reward You will receive 1 CNM Token for like our account and shared post  Conditions: 1. Only one Facebook account per person is allowed 2. Conterium team will check the like fans page and shared post for eligibility 3. The shared post must not devalue Conterium 4. Any abuse will have all Bounty applications suspended.  Approved Participants: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1nwUgUf5THKC9lWkhWOusN-xjB-isCCvjkZi-BryAZt0/edit?usp=sharing   TWITTER BOUNTY CAMPAIGN How to participate: 1. Follow Conterium Twitter account: https://twitter.com/onconterium 2. Retweet the following Tweet: https://twitter.com/onconterium 3. Submit the Bounty Application Form: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSe2Ye_V7pdHG_mWnD5c4oPI0EHGZFoLSyQzQFo0RGdxVKhpvA/viewform?usp=sf_link  Reward You will receive 1 CNM Token for following our account and retweeting  Conditions: 1. Only one Twitter account per person is allowed 2. Conterium team will check the followers and retweets for eligibility 3. The retweet must not devalue Conterium 4. Any abuse will have all Bounty applications suspended.  Approved Participants: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1nwUgUf5THKC9lWkhWOusN-xjB-isCCvjkZi-BryAZt0/edit?usp=sharing   ARTICLE BOUNTY CAMPAIGN How to participate: 1. Conterium will reward you for producing written contents about the project and the token sale on your website, medium, or steemit and all media. 2. Submit the Bounty Application Form: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfOKclMsvKJjtT32eJm-fH-54-TUlUfuaeKOIiJ9enzSegCSg/viewform?usp=sf_link  Reward You will get 35 CNM Tokens for an article, depending on the quality, uniqueness and distribution of your content.  Conditions: Conterium team will check the link shared article.  Approved Participants: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1nwUgUf5THKC9lWkhWOusN-xjB-isCCvjkZi-BryAZt0/edit?usp=sharing   VIDEO BOUNTY CAMPAIGN How to participate: 1. Conterium will reward you for producing creative video contents about the project and the token sale. 2. Submit the Bounty Application Form: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfZujk2_fqSfT2yfXODOXd9MmKZI0Dh2OlfEgV7zGJ1Vab83w/viewform?usp=sf_link  Reward You will get 50 CNM Tokens for an video content, depending on the quality, uniqueness and distribution of your content.  Conditions: Conterium team will check the link shared video content and top three creative content got the additional gift from conterium.  Approved Participants: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1nwUgUf5THKC9lWkhWOusN-xjB-isCCvjkZi-BryAZt0/edit?usp=sharing   TRANSLATOR How to participate: 1. The translation must be of a high quality - not done using google translate. 2. The translation should be easily understood by anyone, not to technical or too literal. 3. Submit the Bounty Application Form: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdOts5FC32PEHm6U1iV-nGhOpo2enbDD3mdg8zk-Nk9jvUmUQ/viewform?usp=sf_link  Approved Participants: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1nwUgUf5THKC9lWkhWOusN-xjB-isCCvjkZi-BryAZt0/edit?usp=sharing  Thank you for your participation and contribution.
